CHAT.comment: at the start of the recording June and her mother are sitting on the floor playing with Mr Potatohead.

u.a: June takes off Mr Potatohead's hat
June removes the lips and the shoes
June removes the shoe that her mother has put on Mr Potatohead
June blocks her mother's attempt at putting the hat on Mr Potatohead .
June tries unsuccessfully to put the hat on Mr Potatohead .
June puts the hat in the nose slot .
June takes the nose from her mother .
June removes the hat from the nose slot , puts nose in ear slot and then takes off Mr Potatohead's shoe .
June throws Mr Potatohead up the room .
June puts the nose in the right hole .
puts the nose in its correct place
wanders off to play with the microphone stand , she takes Mr Potatohead's shoe with her .
June looks in the toybox and pulls out a tattered mothergoose book .
mother still reciting with increasing signs of exasperation
silence during which June is holding the book and turning the pages .
June has her back to the camera .
mother holds up a toy train .
silence during which June drops the book and mother picks it up again .
mother picks up another book with a picture of a duck on the front .
June takes the book and looks at it .
June holds a book up to her mother .
June takes the book , turns the page and hands it back again .
silence , June takes the book again , turns another page and hands it back again .
points to a picture in the book
mother attempts to turn the page but June resists .
very heavy streass on final a@l .
June looks at the new book
mother points to the picture in the book
points to the items in the book
June lies down to look at the bathtime book , silence , mother gets a toy ladybug out of the toybox and drags it across the floor towards June .
silence during which June pushes the bug across the floor .
silence during which June plays with the bug .
silence during which June picks up an alphabet cube and then throws it across the room
June picks up the cube again
mother drops another cube in front of June , June picks it up and throws it .
mother drops another cube in front of her , June throws this one across the room too , mother digs a tennis ball out of the toybox .
June takes it and throws it across the room .
June takes the cube and throws it across the room
mother begins to bounce the tennis ball .
mother produces a wooden car out of the toybox
June picks up a cube and throws it again .
mother picks up a toy rabbit
June picks up a cube and drags it by mother
June takes the duck from her mother .
June holds up the rabbit to her mother
June throws the bunny to mother .
June stands up , picks up a cube and hands it to her mother .
June turns and looks around her .
June walks off with the cube and tries to bounce it
June picks another cube out of the toybox and drops it .
June picks out another cube and drops it .
June picks out a third cube .
June picks up a second cube from the floor .
June tosses the cube into the toybox .
June tosses the other cube that she is holding into the box .
June starts to wander around looking for something , mother holds up a cube .
bangs the cube on the toybox
June reaches out and takes the cube .
June puts the cube on her trike .
mother holds up a toy dog
June puts the dog on her trike .
June has difficulty negotiating the toys on the floor .
mother clears the way . June picks up the cube from the trike .
mother pushes the trike to and fro .
June replaces the cube on her trike .
June picks up the dog and sits it in front of the cube on the trike .
June picks up the dog and dumps it on the floor .
June pushes the cube off the trike and on to the floor .
June sees a cube across the room and she goes to get it .
June looks at the camera and then tosses the cube on to the floor
June goes to retrieve the ball from where it landed by the foot of the camera but she is concerned about getting to close to the camera and backs away from it .
June edges cautiously towards the camera again .

still very wary of the camera she reaches out for the cube but is afraid to pick it up , silence during which she walks away and bumps into the microphone causing it to swing back and to . she peers at the microphone closely .
June gets on her trike , advances on the camera but is still afraid to retrieve the cube .
she puts a different cube on the seat of the trike .
mother places a cube on top of the one that June has on her trike seat .

CHAT.comment: a general melee takes place; Roy moves a box and knocks over the microphone , mother moves the trike and the cubes fall off , June turns to watch Roy restoring the microphone.

u.a: picks up a cube and puts it on the trike seat
June picks up the other cube and sits it on top of the one already on the trike seat .
June drops one cube on the floor and the other in the box
June picks up the cube from the floor and puts it in the box
mother holds up a small plastic bottle
June pretends to drink from the bottle
June pretends to drink from the bottle again
June drops the bottle , mother picks it up and knocks it on the trike handle bars .
mother drops it in the toybox
June picks up a wooden car out of the toybox
mother holds up Mr Potatohead's pipe
silence during which June puts the pipe in her mouth and then drops it on the floor .
silence , June tries once more to retrieve the cube from the foot of the camera but she is still wary of the machine .
she suddenly reaches out and grabs the cube
she takes the cube to her mother
mother puts the cube into the toybox
mother puts the rabbit in the toybox , June picks it out again
June pulls at the bow tied around the rabbit's neck
mother pulls on the rabbit's ear .
June turns to her mother and hands her the rabbit .
June is still playing with the rabbit .
June tips the shapes out of the shapesorter
June moves the shapesorter away from her mother and plays with it . silence .
June closes the shapesorter and then turns to her mother because she cannot get it open .
mother and June are both putting shapes into the shapesorter .
June tips them all out again .
mother hands shapes to June and she drops them into the open shapesorter .
June tips out the shapes again
June and mother picking up shapes
mother still handing shapes to June who puts them in the shapesorter .
June turns to look for more .
June stoops , picks up the blocks and drops them into the shapesorter .
June closes the shapesorter and hands it to her mother .
mother opens it and hands it back .
June sees a car on the top of the toybox and goes to get it .
June is ignoring the car and playing with something else in the toybox .
June picks up the shapesorter and walks away with it
June begins to play with Mr Potatohead
June begins to name all the parts of Mr Potatohead .
June attempts to put Mr Potatohead into the shapesorter .
June looks at her mother and then continues to try to put Mister Potatohead in the shapesorter .
June pulls Mister Potatohead out of the shapesorter , the part that she got in .
dumps Mister Potatohead by her mother
June takes the shapesorter over to her mother .
June tips out all the shapes
June begins to pick up the shapes and drop them back into the shapesorter through the open lid .
collects the parts of Mister Potatohead
June has her back to the camera
June still playing with the shapesorter
June stands up and begins to dismantle Mister Potatohead .
silence during which mother begins to reassemble Mister Potatohead .
he is now minus the protrusions which might have previously prevented putting him in the shapesorter
June attempts to put Mister Potatohead into the shapesorter again
mother puts Mister Potatohead's hat back on .
June takes the mouth from her mother , drops it and picks up the hat
June gives the hat back to her mother
June gives the shoe to her mother
June puts the shoe into the shapesorter .
June picks the shoe out of the shapesorter and then puts it back in the box
June attempts to put the hat through the holes in the shapesorter .
June takes the shapesorter to her mother
mother puts a shoe on Mister Potatohead
June immediately removes the offending shoe .
mother places the mouth but June immediately removes it
June hands the shapesorter to her mother
mother opens the box and puts it on the floor .
June gives the shapesorter to her mother again
June pulls off a shoe and drops it into the shapesorter
she hands the shoe to her mother
attempts to put the shoe back on Mister Potatohead .
June drops the shoe in the shapesorter
June closes the shapesorter and then hands it to her mother who opens it .
June picks up Mister Potatohead's hat from the floor
June drops it into the shapesorter
mother moves the shapesorter behind June so that June is forced to face the camera .
puts the shoe on Mister Potatohead
June pulls the shoe off again and drops it in the shapesorter
June takes another part of Mister Potatohead and drops it in the shapesorter
silence , June looks at the stacking blocks .
June stands a stacking block on the side of the cart that they are kept in .
silence during which June plays with the stacking blocks .
June stacks a second block on top of the first
points to the blocks one by one
June rebuilds the stack and succeeds in getting three blocks into it . June tries to place a third block on the stack but they collapse .
she rebuilds it and collapses it again . June collapses the pile again
no response , June carries on playing with the blocks
no response , June builds a six block tower
June begins to rebuild again , as she picks up each block she says thank+you . the tower crashes down
June carries on building , a silence interspersed with laughs , the tower collapses .
June kicks the cart , shakes her head , waves her arms at the blocks
June begins to build her own tower .
silence during which June builds a four block tower .
no response , mother places a block to begin a new pile
June reaches out with the block
but she knocks down the block with it
mother moves the cart closer to June .
June demolishes the towers with a swift chop
June knocks over the blocks that have remained standing .
June picks up a yellow block .
digs in the toybox and produces a tennis ball
mother looks in the toybox again .
June digs in the toybox and begins to pull things out of it , she produces an object and drops it
she produces another object and drops it .
she produces another object and drops it .
June finally produces a cloth book and settles on it .
mother hands the train book to June
